targetLine.text: E, I just need a patch job.

contextBefore.text: Milan, darling. Milan. Supermodels. Ha! Nothing super about them. Spoiled, stupid, little stick figures with poofy lips who think only about themselves. Feh! I used to design for gods.... but perhaps you come with a challenge, eh? I was surprised to get your call.

contextAfter.text: Hmm. This is megamesh. Outmoded, but very sturdy. And you’ve torn right through it ! What have you been doing , Robert? Moonlighting hero work?
Musta happened a long time ago.
I see. This is a hobo suit , darling, you can’t be seen in this!
